title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when choosing SWT.MULTI. Somehow, it is assumed that it should not produce a beeping sound in this scenario.
OB: When I click on Styles SWT.SINGLE and then go back to Styles SWT.MULTI in the Text tab of the ControlExample, I hear a Windows 'ding' sound.
EB: I should not hear a Windows 'ding' sound when selecting SWT.MULTI in the ControlExample Text tab.
SR:
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Go to the Text tab.
3. Click on Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on Styles SWT.MULTI.
